name: Finishing
description: Dominate near the rim with powerful finishes and dunks

goals.objective: Win 20 Games
Make 200 Close-Range Shots
Win 50 Games with Teammate Grade A- or higher
Make 400 Close-Range Shots
Win 50 Games with 6 or more Shots Made in the Paint in each Win
Make 600 Close-Range Shots
Win 100 Games with 6 or more Shots Made in the Paint in each Win
goals.reward: Badge Park Max +1 Finishing, Unique Finishing Archetype Name

goals.objective: Make 1000 Close-Range Shots
goals.reward: Finishing Cap Breaker, Anthony Edwards Jersey

goals.objective: Make 2000 Close-Range Shots
goals.reward: Badge Park Max +2 Finishing, Finishing Leg Sleeve

name: Shooting
description: Become a lethal scorer from anywhere on the court

goals.objective: Win 20 Games
Make 100 Mid-Range Shots OR Make 100 3PT Shots
Win 50 Games with Teammate Grade A- or higher
Make 250 Mid-Range Shots OR Make 250 3PT Shots
Win 50 Games with 5 or more Jumpshots Made in each win
Make 500 Mid-Range Shots OR Make 500 3PT Shots
Win 100 Games with 5 or more Jumpshots Made in each win
goals.reward: Badge Park Max +1 Shooting, Unique Shooting Archetype Name

goals.objective: Make 1000 Mid-Range Shots OR Make 1000 3PT Shots
goals.reward: Shooting Cap Breaker, Larry Bird Jersey

goals.objective: Make 2000 Mid-Range Shots OR Make 2000 3PT Shots
goals.reward: Badge Park Max +2 Shooting, Shooting Arm Sleeve

name: Playmaking
description: Control the pace and create opportunities for your team

goals.objective: Win 20 Games
Get 200 Assists OR Get 200 Relay Assists
Win 50 Games with Teammate Grade A- or higher
Get 500 Assists OR Get 500 Relay Assists
Win 50 Games with 5 or more Assists in each win
Get 1000 Assists OR Get 1000 Relay Assists
Win 100 Games with 5 or more Assists in each win
goals.reward: Badge Park Max +1 Playmaking, Unique Playmaking Archetype Name

goals.objective: Get 1500 Assists OR Get 1500 Relay Assists
goals.reward: Playmaking Cap Breaker, Tyrese Haliburton Jersey

goals.objective: Get 2000 Assists OR Get 2000 Relay Assists
goals.reward: Badge Park Max +2 Playmaking, Playmaking Headband

name: Defense
description: Lock down opponents and protect your team's basket

goals.objective: Win 20 Games
goals.reward: Steals Skill Boosts (10 games), Blocks Skill Boosts (10 games)

goals.objective: Defend 100 Shots Well
Win 50 Games with Teammate Grade A- or higher
Get 250 Steals OR Get 250 Blocks
Win 50 Games with at least 3 Blocks and Steals Combined in each win
goals.reward: Steals Skill Boosts (25 games), Blocks Skill Boosts (25 games)

goals.objective: Defend 250 Shots Well
Win 100 Games with at least 3 Blocks and Steals Combined in each win
goals.reward: Badge Park Max +1 Defense, Unique Defense Archetype Name

goals.objective: Get 400 Steals OR Get 400 Blocks
goals.reward: Defense Cap Breaker, Ben Wallace Jersey

goals.objective: Defend 1500 Shots Well
goals.reward: Badge Park Max +2 Defense, Defense Hand Tape

name: Rebounding
description: Control the boards and give your team extra possessions

goals.objective: Win 20 Games
Get 200 Rebounds
Win 50 Games with Teammate Grade A- or higher
Get 350 Rebounds
Win 50 Games with 5 or more Rebounds in each win
Get 600 Rebounds
Win 100 Games with 5 or more Rebounds in each win
goals.reward: Badge Park Max +1 Rebounding, Unique Rebounding Archetype Name

goals.objective: Get 1250 Rebounds
goals.reward: Rebounding Cap Breaker, Wilt Chamberlain Jersey

goals.objective: Get 2000 Rebounds
goals.reward: Badge Park Max +2 Rebounding, Rebounding Elbow Sleeve
